plot: This WW2 story follows the personal feud between a Soviet sniper and a German sniper during the war in Russia and even after the war in a Soviet occupied and defeated Germany.
title: Snayper. Oruzhie vozmezdiya
plot_es: This WW2 story follows the personal feud between a Soviet sniper and a German sniper during the war in Russia and even after the war in a Soviet occupied and defeated Germany.
plot_en: This WW2 story follows the personal feud between a Soviet sniper and a German sniper during the war in Russia and even after the war in a Soviet occupied and defeated Germany.
